normalized: 2 weeks had passed since that.
i hadn't encountered yukikaze even once.
i had met shizuru-san face-to-face at school, but we treated each other as teacher and student.
naturally, i wasn't visiting her room in the middle of the night.
we didn't kiss or have sex either.
nothing that either changed the situation or required urgency had happened.
in short, over these two weeks, i had been hiding perfectly for a taimanin.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （ah, shizuru-san…）
shizuru-san was walking from the opposite direction.
i bowed my head slightly, just like i did towards the other teachers, whereupon
shizuru-san also glanced at me like she did to the other students, and we passed by one another without exchanging any words at all.
i should have been okay with that.
however, something struck me.
it felt like i had spent the time doing nothing.
no, there was no sufficient basis for thinking that.
i was just succumbing to unease, with no reason for it.
i knew that.

name: tatsurou
normalized: fuuh…
i breathed a sigh.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （now that i think of it, i wonder if that morita is doing well?
he had also become a scholarship student and gone to the elite building, and no longer showed his face over here.
i had had a feeling it would be like that.
i had no problem if that sex-crazed guy wasn't around, but once the person who had always been cheerfully messing with me was gone, that was lonesome in its own way.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i wonder if she's coming today?
at lunchtime, i always searched for yukikaze in the cafeteria.
even i thought that was pathetic, knowing that she wouldn't be there, but i felt compelled to do so.
against my better judgement, i ended up hoping.
“will yukikaze come to see me today?
however…

name: tatsurou
normalized: （she's not here, huh…?
figures…）
i had scanned the cafeteria from one end to the other, but the figure of yukikaze wasn't there.
it wasn't like she would be.
yukikaze was a taimanin, after all.

name: tatsurou
normalized: haah…
i breathed a sigh again at my own unwillingness to give up, and was about to go to the meal ticket counter, when

name: tatsurou
normalized: huh?
i noticed that the situation was different from usual.
some boys were gathering around one of the tables and making a racket.
there were even quite a few guys from my class.
i could hear voices saying, 『i can't see!
』, 『show me too!
』, 『awesome!
』 and so on.
it seemed like they were crowding to look at something.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what are they doing…?
that's, morita?
that morita was at the centre of the commotion.
huh.
he had come over here.
this was the first time, wasn't it?

name: tatsurou
normalized: oi, morita!
i called out to morita, who had now become an elite in the scholarship course.

name: morita
normalized: mm?!
ah, akiyama!
yo!
morita looked my way with a surprised face, then

name: morita
normalized: that's all, then.
closed his open laptop in a strangely hurried manner.
those around him started making a fuss: 『this is the end?!
』, 『show us more!
』, 『i still couldn't see clearly!
』 and so on.

name: morita
normalized: it's over, it's over.
i showed you extra today.
okay, break it up.
being cruelly shooed away by morita, the guys who had gathered were dispersing, while grumbling things like 『stingy, isn't he?
』 and 『damn scholarship students.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it's been a while.
i approached morita, who had been left on his own.

name: morita
normalized: well, haha… it sure has been a while, akiyama!
morita laughed, firmly slapping my shoulder.
it seemed like he was still the same as before he went to the other side.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you didn't come over here at all, did you?
in spite of saying we'd be friends forever.

name: morita
normalized: sorry, sorry.
i've been hard at work over there.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's 'cause you're suddenly a scholarship student, right?
are you busy?

name: morita
normalized: o-oh, i'm incredibly busy.
also 'cause akiyama seemed kind of mad at me.
morita said, strangely uneasily.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, that?
don't worry about it.
i was angry last time because i got told something about yukikaze.

name: morita
normalized: th, that's right, isn't it…?
yukikaze-chan's pretty, isn't she?
and incredibly smart.
she's top-notch, even in the scholarship course.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i know, right?
is yukikaze doing well?

name: morita
normalized: eh?
of course.
she's doing the best in the scholarship course!
everyone says so!
someone like myself, who's just entered, is no match for her at all!

name: tatsurou
normalized: really?
good.
morita didn't lie about things like this.
or rather, he couldn't lie about them by nature.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （yukikaze, you're being a proper scholarship student, huh?
having checked something that had worried me all this time, i became a little bit relieved.

name: tatsurou
normalized: so, what were you all looking at?

name: morita
normalized: eh?

name: tatsurou
normalized: your notebook.
'cause they were being rowdy for some reason, as soon as you came here after so long.

name: morita
normalized: ah… well, a little.
like, it's no big deal.
morita grinned as he spoke evasively.
i remembered this face.
it was his face when he played dumb about something dirty.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you were showing everyone a dirty video or something, weren't you?
i gently tapped on his closed laptop.

name: morita
normalized: ah, well.
i figured, akiyama doesn't like dirty things, right…?
heheheh.
well, i'm off.
carrying his laptop under his arm, morita stood up in a hurry.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what?
aren't you going to show me?

name: morita
normalized: it's risky, when there are still people gathered here.

name: tatsurou
normalized: how about lunch?
why don't we eat together for the first time in a while?
i'll treat you.

name: morita
normalized: sorry, today i'm advertising the…

name: tatsurou
normalized: advertising?

name: morita
normalized: no, it's nothing!
see you!
morita left the cafeteria, oddly flustered.

name: tatsurou
normalized: strange guy.
putting the dirty videos aside, i had wanted to chat for the first time in a while, though.
i also wanted to hear more about yukikaze's situation.

name: tatsurou
normalized: mm?
a piece of paper had been left behind on the table that morita had vacated.
it was a business card.
i picked it up.
『our y buta (pig)-chan's lady diary』
『we update every week, so support our affiliates, okay?
after that, the address of a web page.
it was a business card with a tremendously poor design, just printed in black on a white background, which gave off a handmade feeling.
it seemed that morita had been distributing these to his former classmates on the general course.

name: tatsurou
normalized: “we update every week, so support our affiliates”…
i smiled wryly because of morita, who was the same as ever.
it looked like he planned to make money by acquiring affiliates for a site where he uploaded dirty videos.
he had become a very rich person, and a scholarship student, but his stinginess in this department hadn't changed.
he was a guy who liked things like this.
that motivation for profit might have been something he inherited from his father, whom he said had been successful with his stocks.
if something like this were discovered by a teacher, morita would be not unlikely to get kicked out of school.
i put it in my pocket.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i'll deliver it to him after school.
i had gotten a reason to go to the elite building.
perhaps i would be able to meet yukikaze.
of course, that was out of my control.
i was feeling faint hope.
